title: Now is your chance Riot (Read more)
body:
Riot, When you add small TU or major VU update some skins to better quality, then while you do that increase the price so us junkies want to get it before it goes up then never play it ever again, You can start it off by making Shadow prince Malzahar 975 slap some yellow in his skills makes his voidling yellow and saying its a new project to increase the quality of the skins.

And with this you are able to  increase your profits because when something is new they think its cool then when a nice looking skin is came out but its really cheap now and the price is increasing they will say "Oh I need to get it now before they increase the price!", so basically you are going to make more profit to minor changes like Shadow prince Malzahar, Also because his skin splash art is yellow.

What do you think, 
Do you think this will be a good idea
This will also increase the quality of older skins instead of making them look like a recolour with or without minor model changes.

replies.body: Also maybe make Shadow prince malzahar have white or blonde hair and change the splash art a little, And maybe change the name to Justicar Malzahar to add it to the line, because shadow prince sounds evil and dark while in this he looks somewhat good.
The thing is, Malzahar *is* evil. He's all about opening a stable portal to the Void and destroying Runeterra.
Riot have said numerous times that the point of skins is that they allow them to offer different iterations of champions. They're not supposed to be coherent with lore.
I only buy skins when they are half price but this is a bad idea

yea ah no.

you have too much time on your hands to think of something like this.
A lot of champions are just receiving Texture Rebalances so they look better on the new map. That's what Malzahar got in the PBE.
